properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_BD A WHERE A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = 'HP_NTC'

SELECT A.HP_BD_NO , A.HP_BD_TITLE , A.HP_BD_CONTENT , A.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_BD_WATCHED , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_MEM_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_BD_NO , B.HP_BD_TITLE , B.HP_BD_CONTENT , B.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_BD_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_MEM_NO , B.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO FROM (SELECT C.HP_BD_NO , C.HP_BD_TITLE , C.HP_BD_CONTENT , C.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_BD_WATCHED , D.MEM_NAME , C.HP_MEM_NO , C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO FROM HOSPITAL_BD C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON(C.HP_MEM_NO = D.MEM_NO) WHERE C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = 'HP_NTC' ORDER BY C.HP_BD_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE HOSPITAL_BD A SET A.HP_BD_WATCHED = (SELECT B.HP_BD_WATCHED + 1 FROM HOSPITAL_BD B WHERE B.HP_BD_NO = ? ) WHERE A.HP_BD_NO = ?

SELECT A.HP_BD_NO , A.HP_BD_TITLE , A.HP_BD_CONTENT , A.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_BD_WATCHED , B.MEM_NAME , A.HP_MEM_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO FROM HOSPITAL_BD A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON(A.HP_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.HP_BD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_BD A JOIN MEM_INFO B ON (A.HP_MEM_NO = B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.HP_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND B.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_BD A WHERE A.HP_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND A.HP_BD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL_BD A WHERE A.HP_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' AND A.HP_BD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.HP_BD_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , A.HP_BD_TITLE , A.HP_BD_CONTENT , A.HP_MEM_NO , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_BD_WATCHED , A.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_BD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_BD_NO , B.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , B.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , B.HP_BD_TITLE , B.HP_BD_CONTENT , B.HP_MEM_NO , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_BD_WATCHED , B.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_BD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.HP_BD_NO , C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , D.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , C.HP_BD_TITLE , C.HP_BD_CONTENT , C.HP_MEM_NO , E.MEM_NAME , C.HP_BD_WATCHED , C.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_BD_STATUS FROM HOSPITAL_BD C JOIN HOSPITAL_BD_CATEGORY D ON (C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = D.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEM_INFO E ON(C.HP_MEM_NO = E.MEM_NO) WHERE C.HP_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HP_BD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.HP_BD_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , A.HP_BD_TITLE , A.HP_BD_CONTENT , A.HP_MEM_NO , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_BD_WATCHED , A.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_BD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_BD_NO , B.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , B.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , B.HP_BD_TITLE , B.HP_BD_CONTENT , B.HP_MEM_NO , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_BD_WATCHED , B.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_BD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.HP_BD_NO , C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , D.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , C.HP_BD_TITLE , C.HP_BD_CONTENT , C.HP_MEM_NO , E.MEM_NAME , C.HP_BD_WATCHED , C.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_BD_STATUS FROM HOSPITAL_BD C JOIN HOSPITAL_BD_CATEGORY D ON (C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = D.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEM_INFO E ON(C.HP_MEM_NO = E.MEM_NO) WHERE C.HP_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HP_BD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.HP_BD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.HP_BD_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , A.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , A.HP_BD_TITLE , A.HP_BD_CONTENT , A.HP_MEM_NO , A.MEM_NAME , A.HP_BD_WATCHED , A.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , A.HP_BD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.HP_BD_NO , B.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , B.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , B.HP_BD_TITLE , B.HP_BD_CONTENT , B.HP_MEM_NO , B.MEM_NAME , B.HP_BD_WATCHED , B.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , B.HP_BD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.HP_BD_NO , C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO , D.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NAME , C.HP_BD_TITLE , C.HP_BD_CONTENT , C.HP_MEM_NO , E.MEM_NAME , C.HP_BD_WATCHED , C.HP_BD_DRAWUP_DATE , C.HP_BD_STATUS FROM HOSPITAL_BD C JOIN HOSPITAL_BD_CATEGORY D ON (C.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO = D.HP_BD_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEM_INFO E ON(C.HP_MEM_NO = E.MEM_NO) WHERE C.HP_BD_STATUS = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY C.HP_BD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.HP_BD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE HOSPITAL_BD A SET HP_BD_STATUS = 'N' WHERE HP_BD_STATUS = 'Y' AND HP_BD_NO = ?
